resources.string:
BSCatchphrase is a mixture of catchphrase and the card game BS. 
In this game you aren't allowed to skip words so if you can't get your team to say the word you can try to get them to say something else! 
But if the other team catches your lie they get the point! 
First team to 7 points wins. 
Have fun and DON'T cheat this app will let you (for now) :D
Remember! you can\'t skip ANY words\nThink of a believable lie!
